subject: Lacrosse
Bones
Accidents and Safety
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Almost four years after being severely injured in a car crash, Ben Rubeor scored a team-high 46 goals this season for defending lacrosse champion Virginia.
snippet: Almost four years after being severely injured in a car crash, Ben Rubeor scored a team-high 46 goals this season for defending lacrosse champion Virginia.
